LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.label: 深海戰術刀
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.description: A knife is always handy to have, and under the sea is no exception. The sharp and light blade made from plasteel is a favorite among moyo divers.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.tools.1.label: 刀刃
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.tools.2.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.label: 深海動能鉗
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.description: Kinetic tongs powered by gunpowder, a perfect tool for ship breakers.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.tools.0.label: 鉗身
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.tools.1.label: 鉗刃
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.label: 深海魚叉
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.description: Deep sea alloy harpoon, capable of piercing the scales of small abyss fish.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.tools.1.label: 魚叉
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.label: 深海等離子魚叉
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.description: Harpoon with heated abyss steal blade, capable of piercing the scales of most abyss creatures.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.tools.1.label: 魚叉
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.label: 深海等離子太刀
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.description: An oversized katana with heated abyss steal blade,In the past such weapons were seen as a symbol of Abyss moyo's autonomous industrial capabilities.and was used by abyss forces on a large scale
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.1.label: 劍尖
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.2.label: 劍刃
LanguageData.Bullet_RedMoyoSmall.label: 小型等離子彈栓
LanguageData.Bullet_RedMoyoMedium.label: 等離子彈栓
LanguageData.Bullet_RedMoyoLarge.label: 重型等離子彈栓
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.label: 深海防衛手槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.description: 常見於深淵茉約裝備的小型手槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.tools.0.label: 槍托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.tools.1.label: 槍管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.label: 深海防衛步槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.description: 拓展槍托的防衛手槍,經常用於狩獵與民用防衛.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.tools.0.label: 槍托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.tools.1.label: 槍管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.label: 深海警用手槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.description: a high-power pistol for red moyo armed forces and law enforcement agencies
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.tools.0.label: 槍托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.tools.1.label: 槍管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.label: 深海警用衝鋒槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.description: Small submachine gun for in-cabin combat
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.tools.0.label: 槍托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.tools.1.label: 槍管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.label: 深海軍用步槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.description: A general-purpose assault rifle for red moyo armed forces, It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.tools.0.label: 槍托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.tools.1.label: 等離子刺刀
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.label: 深海精確步槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.description: A sniper rifle that can barely penetrate the shell of abyssal creatures at long distances
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.tools.0.label: 槍托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.tools.1.label: 槍管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.label: 深海重型步槍
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.description: A red moyo versioned large accelerator made to fight off the leviathans that threaten their mothership..
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.tools.0.label: 槍身
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.tools.1.label: 槍管
